item.description:
*** Actual Count for RSVPs is Now 30 People ***

Please try to invite 1 or 2 friends to join us for our February Meeting. Last month we had 14 people, this month I am hoping attendance will expand to 15-20 people!

Christian, Paul and Delia have volunteered to help out for the next meeting.

Proposed Agenda:
6:00 - Introductions and Wine & Refreshments – Christian Tosi
6:20 - Member Agenda Item – Paul Debeasi
6:40 - Online/Offline Social Networking - Phil
7:00 - Speed Networking - All
7:20 - Member Agenda Item – Delia Bucur
7:40 - Boston Ecademy - Phil

Become a member and RSVP "Yes" or "Maybe" by 4:00PM of February 22nd and the cost will be $6.00. Members who do not RSVP will be charged $12.00 at the door. Join today, membership is free!

For non-members, the charge will be $15.00 at the door.

I have decided to offer an encouragement to everyone to bring a friend. So, if you invite someone new to meeting and they come, you will get a $6 credit. In other words, bring a friend and it's free!

Front Door to PHT is locked for security purposes. If you arrive after 6:00PM, please call me on my cell phone (617-429-6571) and I will come open the door.

For more information, see http://us.ecademy.com...
item.name: Boston Ecademy February Meetup
